author: dkhaywood
msg: NakedObjectReflector, NakedObjectPersistor and NakedObjectConfiguration all injected via constructor or setter-based injection wherever possible (constructor preferred); moved NakedObjectConfiguration, UpdateNotifier and MessageBroker interfaces up from nof.core (since all indirectly referenced by ContainerInjector) and added corresponding *Aware and *Provider interfaces to assist with setter-based dependency injection when needed; moved the listener and event firing stuff out of NakedObject/PojoAdapter and into EventFiring interface and EventFiringPojoAdapter

author: dkhaywood
msg: Clock can now be replaced (for testing purposes only) if there is a System.getProperty("nakedobjects.can_replace_clock");

author: scascarini
msg: Tweak to hibernate lazy loading - lazy load by default but only if we can be sure of the actual class across the association.
